text: At one time, three different races were known as the Miller Genuine Draft 500: * Miller Genuine Draft 500, 1990 race at Pocono Raceway (now Kids Free 325) * Miller Genuine Draft 500, 1991–1995 races at Pocono Raceway (now Worry-Free Weather Guarantee 350) * Miller Genuine Draft 500, 1995 race at Dover International Speedway (now Gander RV 400)
title: Miller Genuine Draft 500
